tool_description: Zumata is a new approach in B2B travel API's. In a few simple steps, you can be getting real-time travel pricing, availability and booking worldwide via simple API calls.
name: Zumata
title: Zumata

api_list.name: /hotels
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-zumata.p.rapidapi.com/hotels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-zumata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

headers = {
